question: Write a letter to colleague who gave you a book that helped you for a presentation at work.Describe the presentationWhy was it importantHow did it help you ?
text: I am writing this letter to pay my gratitude for letting your accounting book, which aided me in my office presentation.
As you know, I was assigned to give a demonstration for our company’s upcoming cost-saving project. The whole concept had to be shown in Microsoft Excel and Powerpoint.

This Presentation had a vital role in my promotion since many of our business overseas managers were joining this meeting. Therefore, I had an immense opportunity to impress them in the presence of my boss.

However,I was pretty confident in my stage skills but I was having less knowledge about accounting terms. Although  I tried to learn concepts from the internet ,the information was complicated .This book explains everything in an easy manner . It assisted me to understand the concept thoroughly and helped to make my presentation effective.
I really want to thank you for this and I owe you.
